Who do we see

We accept and treat patients who present themselves with dental emergencies whenever we can and whenever we have clinical capacity. We accept and treat patients even if they're not registered with our practice

How to see us

To be seen in the event of an emergency, simply call 111 or contact the practice either by phone or in person and we will try our best to provide treatment for your situation.

You can contact the practice at 01773 609543

Treatments

Check UpsFillingsExtractionsEmergencyWhiteningInvisalignImplantsCrownsDenturesBridgesPeriodontal
